title: The Spirit
text:
The Spirit may refer to:

The Holy Spirit, a concept in Abrahamic religions
The Spirit (comics character), a fictional character in American comic books
The Spirit (1987 film), a 1987 American film
The Spirit (2008 film), a 2008 American film
The Spirit (album), a 1991 album by Magnum
"The Spirit" (Third Watch), an episode of the television series Third Watch


== See also ==
